articles.title: Secretive mini space shuttle launches on Space Coast - Orlando Sentinel
articles.description: It won’t have any crew, but the U.S. Space Force hitched a ride on SpaceX to send the Boeing-built X-37B spacecraft — which looks like a miniature space shuttle — back for a long-duration mis…

articles.title: Erik Menendez denied parole 36 years after murdering his parents, Lyle Menendez to learn his fate on Friday - ABC News
Trump admin vetting 55 million U.S. visa holders for potential deportation violations - Axios
articles.description: The State Department said it's "revoked more than twice as many visas" as during the same time period last year.

articles.title: Supreme Court Lets US Cut Millions of Dollars in NIH Grants - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A splintered US Supreme Court let the Trump administration temporarily cut off potentially hundreds of millions of dollars in medical research grants that government officials say don’t align with the president’s policies.

articles.title: Meta Poaches Apple AI Executive Even as It Plans Hiring Slowdown - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Meta Platforms Inc. is hiring another key Apple Inc. artificial intelligence executive, even as the social networking company prepares to slow its recruitment, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.title: Djokovic, Shelton headline Day 1 US Open schedule - ATP Tour
articles.description: Four-time US Open champion Novak Djokovic and American stars Ben Shelton and Taylor Fritz are among the players who will compete on Sunday, Day 1 of the main draw at the season's final major.

articles.title: Car bomb and attack on a helicopter in Colombia kill at least 13, including police officers - AP News
articles.description: A car bomb and an attack on a police helicopter in Colombia have killed at least 17 people, including police officers. President Gustavo Petro attributed Thursday's attacks to dissidents of the defunct Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, known as FARC. Tw…

articles.title: Jerry Jones: Micah Parsons’s agent told us to “stick it up our ass” - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Cowboys are basically daring Parsons to not play in 2025.

articles.title: Trump thanks officers and National Guard troops in D.C. stop - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Donald Trump visited law enforcement officers in D.C. as the administration continued its efforts to exert control over the city.

articles.title: Netanyahu orders ‘immediate negotiations’ to release hostages as Israel advances Gaza City operation - CNN
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says he has ordered negotiations for the release of all hostages and an end to the war in Gaza “on terms acceptable to Israel.”

articles.title: New visas paused for commercial truck drivers, Rubio says - Axios
articles.description: By some estimates the trucking industry is already short tens of thousands of drivers.

articles.title: Nicolas Cage In Talks For ‘True Detective’ Season 5 - Deadline

articles.title: Six dead in accident at Colorado dairy - NBC News
articles.description: Six people were killed Wednesday at a Colorado dairy in an accident that is being investigated as toxic gas exposure, officials said

articles.title: Cracker Barrel’s logo redesign sparks ire among some online - PBS
articles.description: Cracker Barrel is marching forward with an ongoing makeover. And to the dismay of some fans, the chain's new logo now ditches the barrel itself.

articles.title: Justice Dept. urges Fed chair to fire top official accused of mortgage fraud - The Washington Post
articles.description: The pressure comes one day after President Donald Trump called for Fed governor Lisa Cook to resign.

articles.title: California Legislature approves Newsom's redistricting plan to counter Texas' new congressional map - ABC7 Los Angeles
articles.description: The California State Assembly and Senate passed a redistricting plan that could slash five Republican-held House seats.
